org.symphonyoss.symphony.clients.impl

Class RoomMembershipClientImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.symphonyoss.symphony.clients.impl.RoomMembershipClientImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RoomMembershipClient

    public class RoomMembershipClientImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements RoomMembershipClient
    Supports the ability to identify and administrate members of a room (stream). It also supports identification of users for any streamID. This includes 1:1 and multi-party chat conversations.
